status.name: Bleed
status.description: Damages enemy for 15% of maximum hp per turn.

status.name: Burn
status.description: Deals 10% maximum hp upon end of duration.

status.name: Bind
status.description: Disables 1 of the 2 basic abilities on the enemy at random.

status.name: Poison
status.description: Damages enemy for 25% of damage dealt each time they attack.

status.name: Blind
status.description: Increases graze chances on enemy by maximum of 15% while active.

status.name: Shock
status.description: Increases damage dealt on opponent by maximum 15% until duration

status.name: Miasma
status.description: Damages maximum of 15% hp whenever an attack is used.

status.name: Blackout
status.description: Prevents the use of ultimate moves for maximum of 3 turns.

status.name: Cripple
status.description: Decreases damage of enemy by maximum of 15% if physical while active.

status.name: Seal
status.description: Descreases damage of enemy by maximum of 15% if magical while active.

status.name: Regeneration
status.description: Heals 5% of Maximum hp per turn.

status.name: Lifesteal
status.description: Heals 10% of damage dealt that turn.

status.name: Purify
status.description: Removes any ailments afflicting the character.

aura.name: Aura of Despair
aura.description: While active, Characters are unable to build ultimate charge.

aura.name: Aura of Restrict
aura.description: While active, you are unable to change characters until death.

aura.name: Aura of Death
aura.description: The chosen character will die if duration reaches 0. Remove by changing characters.
